subtitle: This tasty dish can be served as a main meal or accompaniment.

method.text: Rinse potato slices and pat dry on clean kitchen paper. Use a little of the butter to grease an ovenproof dish.
Layer the slices of potato and tomato in the dish, seasoning well in between each layer.
Beat the garlic with the cream. Pour over the top of the potatoes. Dot the top with the remaining butter. Cover with foil and bake in the oven for 1 hour.
Remove foil. Cook for a further 1 - 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>1</sub> days or until top is golden brown.

title: Tomato gratin Dauphinois
